    public class WindowBlindsTransition
extends de.eskalon.commons.screen.transition.impl.GLTransitionsShaderTransition
    A ManagedScreen transition that emulates window blinds on the screen.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop), Fabien Benetou
